# Dotnet 10 Docs

## What's new

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-10/overview.md): Learn about the new features introduced in .NET 10 for the runtime, libraries, and SDK. Also find links to what's new in other areas, such as ASP.NET Core.
- [Runtime](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-10/runtime.md): Learn about the new features introduced in the .NET 10 runtime.
- [Libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-10/libraries.md): Learn about the updates to the .NET libraries for .NET 10.
- [SDK](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/whats-new/dotnet-10/sdk.md): Learn about the new .NET SDK features introduced in .NET 10.
